title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Introduction to Digital Security for Journalists
description: A handout for MozFest 2016 updated in February 2017, providing an introduction to digital security for journalists, including tips on anonymous research, password management, two-factor authentication, disk encryption, encrypted communications, and secure file storage.
